name: The Creature That He Brought
description:
Edward is a scientist who tries to create life, guide him to the right decision.

Features:

  • There is a dialogue system with the characters (Nothing fancy).
  • Your decisions may impact the development of certain events.
  • Should take you 30 to 40 min to complete it.
  • Understandable quests (Right?).
  • It's still in development.

Other things:

  • It's has been developed with the free assets of RPG Maker MV.
  • The music and plugins have the respective credit.
  • It's my first development that I finally publish, so the more feedback, the better.

Other more things:

  • It's not finished, but it will be finished, and these words will stay here for my reminder.
